short_description: Mufti-functional cleaning kit: Aquarium gravel vacuum cleaner kit is a mufti-functional aquarium cleaner that uses (adopts)the siphon design principle, which includes the aquarium, aquarium sand washing, algae scraping, fish excrement cleaning, aquarium residual debris, and aquarium water changing. New safety design: new manual press design, no electricity required and silent while working. Fish tank cleaning tools uses a high-quality pressure resistant air bag, durable, super strong siphon pressure can quickly draw out the muddy water in the fish tank. The aquarium vacuum pipe has a filter net attached to the filter basket to block the blockage caused by the suction of gravel, while preventing your cute fish and the small gravel in the bathtub from being sucked out of the tank.

Easy to install: This newly upgraded aquarium vacuum is easier to use than traditional fish tank vacuum. Simply hold the handle and press several times until you see water begin to flow out. You can also use a tube to agitate the gravel in the aquarium, causing fish manure, food debris, etc. to drain out of the aquarium with the current. The aquarium cleaning tools is securely attached to the aquarium so you can easily release your hands.

A wide range of multi-combination accessories: aquarium cleaner vacuum crusher is suitable for different types and sizes of fish tanks, equipped with 2 water pipes and 1 joint, press pump, water flow clip, water pipe clip extended outlet hose, aquarium temperature stickers, fishing nets, plastic algae scraping plate, and detailed aquarium vacuum pump manual.

product_description: Maintenance is a necessary part of good aquarium keeping. Routine water changes and pulling debris from gravel helps maintain a natural balance in the aquarium environment. Aqueon Siphon Vacuum Gravel Cleaners help to make this job easier and take less time. Just a simple up and down motion with the intake tube will quickly prime the siphon to begin water flow. Debris is pulled away with flowing water and disposed of while gravel falls to the bottom of the aquarium. Be sure to add Aqueon Water Conditioner when adding clean water to aquarium. Different siphon gravel vacuum sizes are available to accommodate all aquariums. Aqueon products offers a wide range of items so that you can build and maintain a healthy aquatic environment. All the essentials from fish tanks, filters, lighting, food, care, and other supplies that your pet fish needs. We make it easy for you to get your first aquarium and to grow in the hobby as you become more of a fish expert with every step you take and every new thing you learn. For those seasoned hobbyists, we are committed to aquarium product innovation so that we continue to offer products that get you excited. With the Aqueon brand, it's all about the fish.

product_description: As a senior fish lover, my years of experience in fish farming have taught me that the most important thing to keep fish well is the water quality of the fish tank. Generally speaking, in order to keep the water quality of the fish tank clean, we need to change the water in the fish tank every once in a while. But changing the water in the fish tank is very troublesome, so in order to reduce the frequency of water changes. I will choose this aquarium cleaner vacuum to clean the gravel at the bottom of the fish tank. This gravel cleaner for fish tank combines the functions of changing water, cleaning gravel, and scraping algae. For us fish lovers, this tank cleaner can meet most of our needs. It is very convenient to use. You only need to press the handle continuously until the water starts to flow out continuously. At this time, we can use the fish tank cleaner to stir the gravel at the bottom of the fish tank and clean the food residues and feces hidden underneath. At the same time, it can also be used as an aquarium glass scraper to clean the glass of the fish tank. In order to fit fish tanks of different sizes, this fish tank vacuum cleaner can also be used as a water changer for fish tanks. It is equipped with two straight pipes and can be used for fish tanks of different sizes. In addition, this fish tank cleaning kit also comes with a fish tank cleaner magnet for easy glass cleaning, a fish tank thermometer for easy monitoring of the fish tank temperature, and a small fish net. It is very suitable for novice fish keepers.

Directions 1. Prepare the GravelVac by attaching the desired nozzle and tube length. 2. Prime the siphon by placing one end in the aquarium and the other end in a bucket, then pump the handle a few times until water starts flowing. 3. Adjust the flow rate using the thumb-operated regulator. 4. Place the gravel guard against the substrate and gently move it along the tank bottom to clean and collect debris. 5. Empty the debris container as needed. 6. Rinse the GravelVac and components with clean water after use.
Breed Recommendation Medium Breeds, Small Breeds
